Name: Aegis
Description: Enchantment Spell. Enchants all party members within earshot (5...10...11 seconds). 50% chance to block.

Name: Aegis (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. (1...3...3 seconds). Target party member cannot be targeted by hostile spells. Attacks against this party member fail. Cannot self-target.

Name: Balthazar's Aura
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Deals 10...22...25 holy damage each second to foes adjacent to target ally.

Name: Bane Signet
Description: Signet. Deals 26...50...56 holy damage. Causes knock-down if target foe is attacking.

Name: Banish
Description: Spell. Deals 20...49...56 holy damage. Deals double damage to summoned creatures.

Name: Blessed Signet
Description: Signet. You gain 3 Energy for each enchantment you are maintaining. You cannot gain more than 3...20...24 Energy in this way.

Name: Convert Hexes
Description: Spell. Removes all hexes; +10 armor for each Necromancer hex removed (8...18...20 seconds). Cannot self-target.

Name: Divine Boon
Description: Enchantment Spell. Whenever you cast a Protection Prayer or Divine Favor spell on an ally
Upkeep: that ally is healed for 15...51...60. Heal cost: you lose 1 Energy.

Name: Divine Intervention
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Negates the next fatal damage target ally takes. [Negation effect]: heals for 26...197...240.

Name: Draw Conditions
Description: Spell. Transfers all conditions from target ally to yourself. Transfer effect: you gain 6...22...26 Health for each condition. Cannot self-target.

Name: Guardian
Description: Enchantment Spell. (2...6...7 seconds.) 50% chance to block.

Name: Heal Party
Description: Spell. Heals entire party for 30...66...75.

Name: Heal Party (PvP)
Description: Spell. Heals entire party for 30...66...75.

Name: Healing Breeze
Description: Enchantment Spell. (15 seconds.) +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

Name: Healing Seed
Description: Enchantment Spell. (10 seconds.) Target and adjacent allies gain 3...25...30 Health whenever this ally takes damage. Cannot self-target.

Name: Healing Touch
Description: Touch Spell. Heals for 16...51...60. Double Health gain from Divine Favor for this spell.

Name: Holy Veil
Description: Enchantment Spell. Doubles casting time of hexes cast on target ally. End effect: removes a hex.

Name: Infuse Health
Description: Spell. Heals for 100...129...136% of half your current Health. Lose half your current Health. Cannot self-target.

Name: Judge's Insight
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8...18...20 seconds.) Converts target ally's attacks to holy damage and adds +20% armor penetration.

Name: Judgment Strike
Description: Elite Melee Attack. Attacks target and adjacent foes for +13...27...30 Holy damage. Causes knock down on attacking foes. PvE Skill

Name: Life Bond
Description: Enchantment Spell. Half of the damage target ally takes from attacks is redirected to you. Redirected damage is reduced by 3...25...30. Cannot self-target.

Name: Martyr
Description: Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions from all allies to you.

Name: Mend Ailment
Description: Spell. Removes a condition. Removal effect: heals for 5...57...70 for each remaining condition.

Name: Mending
Description: Enchantment Spell. +1...3...4 Health regeneration.

Name: Orison of Healing
Description: Spell. Heals for 20...60...70.

Name: Protective Spirit
Description: Enchantment Spell. (5...19...23 seconds.) Incoming damage is reduced to 10% of target ally's maximum Health.

Name: Purge Conditions
Description: Spell. Removes all conditions.

Name: Purge Signet
Description: Signet. Removes all hexes and conditions. Removal cost: 10 Energy each.

Name: Rebirth
Description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health
Upkeep: 0 Energy). Teleports target to you. Disables target's skills (10...4...3 seconds). You lose all Energy.

Name: Remove Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally.

Name: Resurrect
Description: Spell. Resurrects target party member (25% Health

Name: Retribution
Description: Enchantment Spell. Deals 33% of each attack's damage (maximum 5...17...20) back to the source.

Name: Reversal of Fortune
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Converts the next incoming damage or life steal (maximum 15...67...80) to healing.

Name: Scourge Healing
Description: Hex Spell. (30 seconds.) Whenever target foe is healed

Name: Shield of Regeneration
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...11...13 seconds.) +3...9...10 Health regeneration and +40 armor.

Name: Shielding Hands
Description: Enchantment Spell. (8 seconds.) Reduces incoming damage and life steal by 3...15...18. End effect: heals for 5...41...50

Name: Signet of Devotion
Description: Signet. Heals for 14...83...100.

Name: Signet of Judgment
Description: Elite Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 15...63...75 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

Name: Signet of Judgment (PvP)
Description: Elite Half Range Signet. Knocks down target. Deals 5...41...50 holy damage to target and adjacent foes.

Name: Smite Hex
Description: Spell. Removes a hex from target ally. Removal effect: deals 10...70...85 holy damage to foes in the area of target ally.

Name: Spell Breaker
Description: Elite Enchantment Spell. (5...15...17 seconds.) Target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

Name: Strength of Honor
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 5...21...25 more damage in melee.

Name: Strength of Honor (PvP)
Description: Enchantment Spell. Target ally deals 1...4...5 more damage in melee.

Name: Word of Healing
Description: Elite Spell. Heals for 5...81...100. Heals for 30...98...115 more if target ally is below 50% Health.

Name: Zealot's Fire
Description: Enchantment Spell. (60 seconds.) Whenever you use a skill on an ally
Upkeep: all foes adjacent to that ally are hit for 5...29...35 fire damage. Damage cost: you lose 1 Energy.
